# mylib-button

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property       | Attribute       | Description                                                      | Type                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | Default     |
| -------------- | --------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `colorScheme`  | `color-scheme`  | The current button color scheme (light/dark).                    | `"dark" \| "light"`                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | `undefined` |
| `disabled`     | `disabled`      | If true, the button is disabled.                                 | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | `undefined` |
| `icon`         | `icon`          | The icon name to include in the button.                          | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | `''`        |
| `iconPosition` | `icon-position` | The position to align the icon to, relative to the button label. | `"center" \| "left" \| "right"`                                                                                                                                                                                                                | `'left'`    |
| `iconSize`     | `icon-size`     | The size of the icon contained in the button                     | `"lg" \| "md" \| "sm" \| "xs"`                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | `'md'`      |
| `iconType`     | `icon-type`     | The icon type to include in the button.                          | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | `''`        |
| `label`        | `label`         | The button's text label.                                         | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | `''`        |
| `size`         | `size`          | The size of the button.                                          | `"lg" \| "md" \| "sm" \| "xs"`                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | `'md'`      |
| `toggled`      | `toggled`       | Sets the button state as pressed/active.                         | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | `false`     |
| `type`         | `type`          | The type of the button.                                          | `"button" \| "reset" \| "submit"`                                                                                                                                                                                                              | `'button'`  |
| `variant`      | `variant`       | The style variant of the button.                                 | `"accent-caution" \| "accent-high-contrast" \| "accent-marketing" \| "accent-mid-contrast" \| "accent-negative" \| "accent-positive" \| "base" \| "caution" \| "chromeless" \| "chromeless-colorless" \| "custom" \| "negative" \| "positive"` | `'base'`    |


## Events

| Event        | Description                                  | Type               |
| ------------ | -------------------------------------------- | ------------------ |
| `clickEvent` | Custom event for when the button is clicked. | `CustomEvent<any>` |
